title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave, blue applied by brush
dimensions:
H x W: 45.7 x 27.9 cm (18 x 11 in.)
Repeat H x W: 35.6 x 26.7 cm (14 x 10 1/2 in.)
description: Printed cotton with half-drop repeat of bunches of flowers including tulips, roses and peonies with fine yellow leaves in background.
